dcterms:creator: Laura Ruisa
Mitchell Stern
Julia Proskurnia

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset for testing sequence generation where each letter in the source sequence is shifted by a fixed number of positions down the alphabet.
dcterms:title: Shifted Alphabetic Sequences

dcterms:creator: Laura Ruisa
Mitchell Stern
Julia Proskurnia
William Chan
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset for testing sequence generation based on the Caesar cipher method, where each letter in the source sequence is replaced by a letter some fixed number of positions down the alphabet.
dcterms:title: Caesar Cipher Dataset
